node.title: Escaped prisoner found in Masterton
node.description: An escaped prisoner who fled Rimutaka Prison in Upper Hutt was arrested in central Masterton today.
node.content:
["An escaped prisoner who fled Rimutaka Prison in Upper Hutt was arrested in central Masterton today.", "", "
John Douglas Willis, 59. Photo: Supplied / NZ Police
", "John Douglas Willis, 59, escaped Friday afternoon and was captured today just after 1pm, police said in a press release.", "Police are now investigating where he has been since his escape.", "Details of how he escaped have not been released.", "Willis has been charged with escaping custody and will appear in court tomorrow morning."]
